attributes.action: Reclassify dogs from chattels to living sentient beings.
attributes.additional_details: Because dogs aren’t pieces of property, they’re members of our family and the time has come to reclassify them in line with our neighbours in France.
attributes.background: The time has come to reform the law and reclassify dogs from chattels to sentient living  beings. Dog theft is a huge issue in the UK and the laws surrounding dog ownership are outdated and unacceptable.

rejection.details:
The Government is already passing legislation to formally recognise animals as sentient beings. This is called the Animal Welfare (Sentience) Bill. You can find out more about the Bill here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/animals-to-be-formally-recognised-as-sentient-beings-in-domestic-law

And you can follow progress of the Bill here: https://bills.parliament.uk/bills/2867

If you want the Government to make specific changes to the rights of dogs in law, we may be able to accept a petition requesting this, but you'd need to be clear what additional rights you want dogs to have.
